Open the Gmail application.
Open the Simple SMS Messenger app, displaying the main interface with options like "Search," "Settings," and a list of contacts.
Click "Manage blocked numbers" to access the blocked numbers settings.
Click the three-dot menu icon to reveal options for managing blocked numbers.
Click "Export blocked numbers" to export the blocked numbers to a file.
Click "OK" to export the blocked numbers with the filename "Blocked numbers_2025_03_24_13_32_13".
